titles.title: Support for Working Families Extension Act
To extend for 2 years the Emergency Contingency Fund for State Temporary Assistance for Needy Families Programs, and for other purposes.
Support for Working Families Extension Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Income Security and Family Support.

bill.summary:
Support for Working Families Extension Act - Amends part A (Temporary Assistance for Needy Families) (TANF) of title IV of the Social Security Act to extend through FY2012 the Emergency Contingency Fund for State Temporary Assistance for Needy Families Programs.
Increases the amount of the quarterly grant to a state from the Emergency Fund for subsidized employment expenditures.
Establishes new Emergency Fund grants to states for work support services expenditures.
